item.title: Gathering the Wolf Packs: Scraping World Cup 2018 Squads from Wikipedia
item.description: The Hunt for a Decent List of World Cup 2018 Squads A Template for Scraping Tables from Wikipedia Inspect Element Find and Copy the XPath Scrape Tables with rvest Scraping World Cup 2018 Squads All at Once National Teams and Groupings The Scraping Function Gather All the Squads Tidying the World Cup Squads World Cup 2018 Squads and Group The Hunt for a Decent List of World Cup 2018 Squads With World Cup 2018 to kick off today, I was in search for the past days for a list all the players that will represent their country in the tournament.
